plot outline: A lost child, Sivaraman, is adopted by a low caste couple and grows up to be a cobbler. When he finds his real family who are Brahmins, he is unable to give up on either and begins to lead two lives.
title: Aandan Adimai
plot: A lost child, Sivaraman, is adopted by a low caste couple and grows up to be a cobbler. When he finds his real family who are Brahmins, he is unable to give up on either and begins to lead two lives.
